desc: Execute various actions in the game Hyper Light Drifter by Heart Machine
doc: Execute various actions in the game Hyper Light Drifter by Heart Machine

Method.doc:
Binds hotkeys for HyperLightDrifter

Parameters:
 * mapping - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
  * unlockPurpleOutfit - This will cause the mouse circle to be drawn
parameters: * mapping - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
* unlockPurpleOutfit - This will cause the mouse circle to be drawn
Method.name: bindHotkeys

Method.doc:
Begins dashing back and forth when using keyboard config in Hyper Light Drifter.
If done in the dash store challenge zone, this should unlock the Purple Outfit.

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * None
stripped_doc: Begins dashing back and forth when using keyboard config in Hyper Light Drifter.
If done in the dash store challenge zone, this should unlock the Purple Outfit.
Method.name: unlockPurpleOutfit
Method.desc: Begins dashing back and forth when using keyboard config in Hyper Light Drifter.
